cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 4th Dec 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 4th Dec 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Single Private Ensuite
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: Rate is for 1 person on business only. No meals included. Maximum occupancy 1. Bedding config 1 Q. Private ensuite. TV.. Atherton Town Centre 1.7 kms from ABG. Mobile phone reception.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private entrance with parking on-site. Queen + 2 Singles. Rate is room only, no meals provided. Private ensuite & Digital TV. Pool   with BBQ facilities available for Guest use. Rooms have tea/coffee facilities, microwave & fridge

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.labelDescription: Private entrance with parking on-site. Rate is room only, no meals provided. Private ensuite & TV. Pool with BBQ facilities available for Guest use. Rooms have tea/coffee facilities, microwave & fridge.

privates.name: Standard 6 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Max Occupancy 6, 2Q & 2S.Rate does not include meals.All rooms have a TV.   pool & all weather poolside BBQ facilitilities

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

If you cancel after 23:59 4th Dec 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).
